summary: This mod adds a total of 70 amulets and 70 rings to the game, as well as vanilla circlet crafting.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a total of 70 new necklaces and 70 new rings to the game. I have added a new necklace and ring for every ingot plus Daedric, because the vanilla game only has gold or silver jewelry. 
Now includes recipes for vanilla Circlets!

adds two ingots and two gems to make crafting possible. 
Jade ingots and Copper ingots can be crafted at the smelter or occasionally bought from blacksmiths/ general goods merchants.
Onyx and Flawless Onyx gems are added to leveled loot tables Rarity is about equal to Amethyst gems.

Recipes are a copy of either the recipes for gold jewely or the recipe for silver jewelry, with the gold or silver ingots replaced with the respective material. 
Prices are 10% more than the materials required to make the item, rounded to the nearest multiple of 5. 

Residual energies from the Daedra Heart gives daedric jewelry a bonus of 10 armor for amulets and 5 armor for rings. (Don\'t worry mages, it\'s still classified as clothing) 

As of 1.3, each ingot type has a new ring and amulet for every gem type, plus a plain amulet and ring.


The colors were matched to the ingots, not the armor sets, so the colors, won\'t always match the armors. 

As of 1.2, some names have been changed. As follows: 
\"Malachite\" items are now \"Glass\". 
\"Moonstone\" items are now \"Elvish\". 
\"Orichalcum\" items are now \"Orcish\". 

Also as of 1.2, items require relevant perks to use. Requirements: 
Corundum: Advanced Smithing 
Glass: Glass Smithing 
Elvish: Elvish Smithing 
Daedric: Daedric Smithing 
Dwarven: Dwarven Smithing 
Orcish: Orcish Smithing 
Steel, Iron, and Quicksilver can still be made without perks. 

All can be crafted at the forge under \"Jewelry\". 

SPECIAL NOTE: MTichenor has released a compatibility patch for his mod, [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21724] SkyRealism: Mass and Materials.[/url]


Future Plans: 
Jewelry crafting station *by request*, circlet crafting station for vanilla and new circlets
implement into leveled loot tables 
Add new circlets of other gem/ingot types
new jewelry for the new copper and jade ingots and onyx gems

on the nexus: 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/manageuploads/?go=editfilename&fid=87724&id=23964 

on steam: 
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=95361853 

CHANGELOG: 
1.3: Added 30 more amulets and 30 more rings for missing gem types. Also added recipes for vanilla circlets as well as items to make crafting them an option.
1.2: Name changes, perk requirements and textures changed. 
1.1: Leveled prices, changed recipes on necklaces with ingots less than 100 gold in value to not require flawless gems, added Daedra Heart to required items for Daedric jewelry, slight armor boost from daedric jewelry. Removed cheat chest in breezehome. 
1.0: initial release.
author: NateNexus
